title: Former Finance Secy Hasmukh Adhia nominated again as BoB chairman - Economic Times
content: Former Finance Secy Hasmukh Adhia nominated again as BoB chairman  Economic Times
description: BoB is the third biggest public sector lender after State Bank of India and Punjab National Bank. Adhia retired as Revenue-cum-Finance Secretary in November 2018. It was during his tenure as Financial Services Secretary that the decision to split the post of Chairman and Managing Director of public sector banks was taken to foster greater transparency in decision making.
